channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
@Sean_YYZ So, so good. It shot into my top 5 movies of all time on first viewing.

And this video about it. Chills just thinking about it. https://t.co/eYtYPRB9gR
item.source:markdown:
@Sean_YYZ So, so good. It shot into my top 5 movies of all time on first viewing.
And this video about it. Chills just thinking about it. https://t.co/eYtYPRB9gR

item.description:
This pitch was genetically engineered to appeal specifically to me. https://t.co/dX62LOYYl1

The prices are outside of my tax bracket, but the aesthetic, to say nothing about the Being John Malkovich vibes, is well within it. https://t.co/1Wdt29nA5n
item.source:markdown:
This pitch was genetically engineered to appeal specifically to me. https://t.co/dX62LOYYl1
The prices are outside of my tax bracket, but the aesthetic, to say nothing about the Being John Malkovich vibes, is well within it. https://t.co/1Wdt29nA5n

item.description:
@davewiner For my degree: Family, plus a little bit by myself. For upgrading: A small loan. For both: Public funding.

I’m a Canadian with a Canadian university degree. Canadian universities and colleges are mostly publicly funded. https://t.co/ASbqWkqlGq
item.source:markdown:
@davewiner For my degree: Family, plus a little bit by myself. For upgrading: A small loan. For both: Public funding.
I’m a Canadian with a Canadian university degree. Canadian universities and colleges are mostly publicly funded. https://t.co/ASbqWkqlGq

item.description: Software won’t love you back. https://t.co/3lETlwozEZ
item.source:markdown: Software won’t love you back. https://t.co/3lETlwozEZ

item.description: @jeffjedras I’m not sure why I had to find out for myself whether you were right, but, well, you were right.
item.source:markdown: @jeffjedras I’m not sure why I had to find out for myself whether you were right, but, well, you were right.

item.description:
I think AI art is not only overwhelmingly bad, but overwhelmingly bad for us. So bad for us that I don’t think we’ll ever recover from it. https://t.co/6mnRn9yyJL

Even the good AI art is bad (for us).
item.source:markdown:
I think AI art is not only overwhelmingly bad, but overwhelmingly bad for us. So bad for us that I don’t think we’ll ever recover from it. https://t.co/6mnRn9yyJL
Even the good AI art is bad (for us).

item.description: @cqwww No side-trip to Vancouver this time. Maybe in October.

item.description: @davewiner Hey @samuelclay, does @NewsBlur strip HTML from feed entries? Based on a quick forum search, it looks like you do some light stripping, but just wanted to confirm.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner Hey @samuelclay, does @NewsBlur strip HTML from feed entries? Based on a quick forum search, it looks like you do some light stripping, but just wanted to confirm.

item.description: I long ago moved all of my free apps to @dokku, hosted on a Digital Ocean VPS. I plan on using keeping the one paid Dyno I use for the foreseeable future, though. https://t.co/ntaO1Qd4Jt

item.description: Decafnation returns to cover the 2022 municipal elections in the Comox Valley. And, why yes, I am related to one of the candidates. Thanks for asking! https://t.co/DzwIq9TQfQ

item.description: @PaulKirvan @daringfireball This, from @gruber’s post, is what led me to ask the question: “Or perhaps, as often seems to be the case, the ‘Far Out’ name is just a name and signifies nothing.”
item.source:markdown: @PaulKirvan @daringfireball This, from @gruber’s post, is what led me to ask the question: “Or perhaps, as often seems to be the case, the ‘Far Out’ name is just a name and signifies nothing.”

item.description: Is there a mindfulness meditation for the specific feeling of being fortysomething and not wanting to ask your father for a ride to a meetup where three years ago you met a woman you liked but never followed up with, and who knows if she’s going to be there this time?
item.source:markdown: Is there a mindfulness meditation for the specific feeling of being fortysomething and not wanting to ask your father for a ride to a meetup where three years ago you met a woman you liked but never followed up with, and who knows if she’s going to be there this time?

item.description:
HYFR. https://t.co/EQiYzJpsW0

It’s just wild that there was a TV show in Toronto called Night Walk where a station showed footage of city life during the dark hours as a revenue generation scheme but which was actually somewhat popular. https://t.co/ajxEQq1tWE

https://t.co/wjFYfSO1Py

https://t.co/vyNjWe94I6

item.description: @VancouverSun The indiscretion! The irresponsibility!

item.description:
So much for David Eby becoming the next premier of B.C., I assume. https://t.co/vkvKDNO3SP

Maybe he doesn’t actually want the job.

I sometimes catch myself thinking that becoming the leader of a political party is a punishment rather than an achievement.
item.source:markdown:
So much for David Eby becoming the next premier of B.C., I assume. https://t.co/vkvKDNO3SP
Maybe he doesn’t actually want the job.
I sometimes catch myself thinking that becoming the leader of a political party is a punishment rather than an achievement.
